title: crypto/tls: tls connection broken in 1.5
body:
Hello,
it seems "crypto/tls" is broken since GO 1.5. (Windows)
[Here](https://github.com/leo-stone/fix-go-1.5-tls-issue/blob/master/main.go) you find the code to reproduce the problem. 

~~I could not test on any OS other than Windows.~~
Confirmed on Windows, Linux, OS X (tx @bradfitz )
